resources.string:
OPTIONS MENU:
In the options menu you can find several additional features of this app, e.g. changing the preferences or adding new contacts to your list of birthdays.

LONG-PRESSING A CONTACT:
When you long-press a contact in your list of birthdays, a menu with options will pop up where you can choose to edit or delete an existing entry in your list of birthdays.

ADDING A PHOTO:
You can only add photos for people who are not in your contacts but manually added to this application. For people from your contacts list, please edit the entry in your Android contacts.

WIDGET:
Go to your homescreen and hit "Add", then "Widget" to add the upcoming birthdays to your homescreen. Your widget will be refreshed every 6 hours!

1970 PROBLEM:
If you cannot enter dates prior to 1970, you probably have a Motorola device. There are several devices by Motorola and other manufacturers which prevent you from typing a date before 1970 due to a bug. We cannot change this, sorry!

NO NOTIFICATIONS:
The latest versions of Android, i.e. 4.0 and 4.1, offer special settings for notifications. For example, you can switch off all notifications in the status bar (where 3G, Wi-Fi, GPS and Bluetooth are located) or disable notifications in "Manage apps" among your settings. Please check these settings if your notifications don't work.

MOVING TO EXTERNAL STORAGE:
You cannot move this app to the external storage (SD card) as notifications for upcoming birthdays wouldn't work in that case. Sorry!

SUPPORTED DATE FORMATS:
We fully support date formats according to ISO 8601, that is YYYY-MM-DD. For other formats, we cannot guarantee that they are read correctly.

CAN I HELP TRANSLATING THE APP?
Yes, you can. Just use our application on Facebook, where you can easily edit all translations and improve them for all users. Please open the following link on a desktop computer for better reading and editing: http://birthdays.latein.me/
Contacts\' photos will not be shown.

If possible, you should always add birthdays to your contacts. You can use more features then.
Here you can send a copy of your list to your email address so that you have a secure backup. This will prevent your data from being lost.
Please enter a valid email address!

Sorry, the import could not be finished!
Please look for the backup mail that you have exported here in your email inbox and copy the full text of this email. When you are ready, please click \"Load backup\" below.
This is an invalid entry. Please long-press it and choose \"Change date\".
Please describe the problem or the error that occurs. Be as specific as possible.
Do you want zodiac signs to be shown?
The notification sound will be repeated until you close the notification.
The notification sound will only be played once.

You can use our application \"Birthdays for Android\" on Facebook in order to export all your Facebook friends\' birthdays to this app. If you proceed, we will open the application on the Facebook website for you. It will guide you through 5 easy steps - just try it.\nAlternatively, you can open \"bit.ly/birthdays_export\" in your desktop browser.

This feature requires permissions for Internet and SD card access! For that reason, it is only available with our free add-on (via Google Play). You can choose: Use this app without those extended permissions or download the free add-on to enjoy additional features. The add-on enables you to create and load backups from SD card, import birthdays from Facebook easily and so on. Just try it! It\'s free.
Permits data exchange between the Birthdays app and its add-on.
Sorry, the export of your data could not be started!

Your add-on is not up-to-date anymore! Please tap the button below to visit Google Play and update it to the latest version for free. All features will then work perfectly again.

A convenient way of date selection that lets you pick day, month and year from a list.
A simple text field will be shown. You can type the date manually. This is useful if your device does not accept years prior to 1970 otherwise.
